title: "How did a military service opportunity lead to unexpected success in magnetism healing?"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author talks about his unexpected success and eccentricities, and how he had to give up on them when he joined military service. However, he discovered a new talent as a thaumaturge and started using it to help his fellow soldiers. In the last 200 tokens, the author describes how he gained popularity among his comrades as he successfully treated them with his magnetic passes. Initially, they thought of it as a joke, but seeing results, they regarded him as a type of "sorcerer." However, the author soon realized that his fame was short-lived as people tend to change their views when they see you too closely.
content: On le vit alors se palper la joue avec ahurissement. Ce fut le signal d’un redoublement de plaisanteries. Mais mon troupier était devenu sérieux et c’est avec un accent profondément convaincu qu’il s’écria tout à coup : « Vous avez beau rigoler !… Le plus rigolo, c’est que je n’ai plus mal ! » Ce coup de théâtre me fit immédiatement considérer comme « un type à part ». Ma maigreur excessive et ma physionomie énergétique contribuèrent à impressionner mes nouveaux camarades. Ils me crurent doué de quelque puissance surnaturelle. Profitant de mon prestige je passais le soir dans les chambres pour magnétiser les malades. Chaque fois j’obtenais pour le moins un soulagement notable. Bientôt ma réputation fut si bien établie qu’on prit l’habitude à la compagnie de m’adresser tous ceux qui se plaignaient du moindre malaise. C’était alors toujours la même rengaine : « Va trouver le sorcier de la première escouade, il t’enlèvera cela comme avec la main » ! Cependant, on ne reste pas longtemps prophète aux yeux de ceux qui vous voient de trop près.
last_phrase: In conclusion, while the narrator's reputation as a "magnetic healer" brought him initial prestige and respect among his comrades, he eventually learned the limits of his supposed powers when he encountered fake maladies and those who manipulated his abilities. However, a chance encounter with a suffering young boy reignited his compassion and reminded him of the true purpose of healing.
